short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple chrome extension to sanitize HAR file contents

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SanitizHAR is a simple Chrome devtool extension that allows you to handpick and hide any sensitive headers, cookies, or query params from your HAR file. Simply go to the dev tools tab, choose all the fields you want to sanitize, and get your squeaky clean HAR file. Piece of cake!
